sqlMap.select: SELECT FID FROM PLACEUSER WHERE FID = #fid# AND EMAIL=#email#
SELECT B.FID, A.FNAME FROM PLACE A INNER JOIN PLACEUSER B ON A.FID = B.FID AND A.ISAUTH='Y' AND B.ISDELETE='N' WHERE B.EMAIL = #email#
SELECT A.FID, A.FNAME FROM PLACE A INNER JOIN PUSER B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL AND A.ISAUTH='Y' AND B.ISDELETE='N' WHERE B.EMAIL = #email#

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.UID, B.EMAIL, B.NAME, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, A.ISDELETE, B.MOBILE FROM PLACEUSER A INNER JOIN PUSER B ON A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL AND A.ISDELETE='N' AND B.ISDELETE='N' WHERE A.FID = #fid#
AND B.NAME like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR B.EMAIL like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR B.MOBILE like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%')
ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortDirection$ LIMIT #startRow#,#endRow#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PLACEUSER(FID, EMAIL, SAVEDATE, ISDELETE) VALUES(#fid#, #email#, now(), 'N')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PLACEUSER SET ISDELETE = #isDelete# WHERE UID = #uid#
